title: Harden /products UI against external image hotlink failures for newly seeded catalog items

requirements.summary: Keep product browsing UI resilient when externally hotlinked product images fail to load, while continuing to render expanded categories and product grids.
acceptanceCriteria: If an external product image fails to load on a category detail page, the UI falls back to the existing SafeExternalImage fallback image and the product grid layout remains intact.
The /products page can display the expanded set of categories (including Furnishing and Decor) without breaking category tiles.
Category detail pages continue to render a product grid for seeded items even when some external images fail.

file_operations.description: Improve SafeExternalImage robustness by resetting internal state when the `src` prop changes (so navigation/re-renders donâ€™t keep a stale fallback), and ensure the fallback behavior remains reliable for hotlinked image failures.

Update category tile image selection logic to explicitly handle new seeded categories (e.g., Furnishing) and ensure category tiles always render a valid local generated image asset even if backend descriptions vary.
